verses.text: Blest, so I can know how much I need thee! Walk and die, fail poor and blind; Take my trembling hand and lead me. In the right path let me find. Wait-ing, trusting, still I call on thee.
O take me with thy love to keep beside thee, Stand with me on the rock; And in the sunshine of thy love I'll hide me, All with thee, now shorn I'll walk-ing, trust-ing, still I call on thee.
Thus will I see the bless-ed, Savior, still with me in dark-ness, love Divine; Till with thee, now shorn I'll walk-ing, trust-ing, still I call on thee.

chorus.text: Ev - 'ry hour, ev - 'ry hour, Blessed Lord, how much I need thee, Ev-'ry hour, ev - 'ry hour, Sav-iour, keep me, ev - 'ry hour.
